text: Hi there! Is anyone else facing this issue? I cannot see any of the templates from the Marketplace. Thanks!
Hi <@U019VTD5BDE> can you DM me your portal ID so I can investigat?

Hi all! I am currently trying to create a custom design for timeline event template for contacts inside Timeline event templates
<https://app.HubSpot.com/developer/9185528/application/238759/event-templates/draft|New event template> page. I wanted to remove the details toggle from event records. Is there any possibility to add custom one here?
